resources.string: Solve as many puzzles as you can in 2 minutes! :)
Reminder: Start the game after reading the game rule.
We are still working on the customization part, \n please come back at phase2.
Thanks for playing obstacle game! \n Your Score is
The account does not exist or password does not match
Choose one speed of each mole stay on screen:

To start the game, make sure you switch your phone to landsacpe mode. Then you can set the customization option in the menu, or simply get started right away using default customizations/n. Before the game starts, there would be a 5 seconds count down, after which you can start controlling the spaceship to doge obstacles by tapping on the screen.

In each game you have 3 lives, and your lives will decrease by 1 whenever you hit an obstacle, after you hit the obstacle each time your will not lose further lives in the next 3 seconds. You lose the game by having your lives reduce to 0 or staying out of the screen for too long. The obstacles are infinite so survive for as long as you can.
